entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
